course_title: Russian Literature in Translation - RUSS LIT IN TRAN

sections.comments: This course focuses on the nineteenth-century Russian novel and its development. Together we will read Pushkin's Eugene Onegin, Dostoevsky's The Idiot, and Tolstoy's Anna Karenina, with a particular focus on the form of the novel, character psychology, and historical and cultural context. Taught asynchronously online.

description: A comprehensive historical and critical presentation with emphasis on the nineteenth and twentieth centuries.
